name: Smoosh TV (raeleus)
description:
Hello! This game was not only made to test Unbox2D (a very special thanks to Lyze for his support), but to also to challenge myself to make a game in a day. Due to unforeseen issues, I had to extend it by another day. 48 hours is still impressive, right?

Inspired by Smash TV, Geometry Wars, The Running Man, and your mom (who gave me a standing ovation last night ya know what I'm saying, right?) The theme for the Horror Jam was A Game of Life and Death. I didn't have much time to incorporate the story of the oppressive game show that pits the player at odds with the evils of capitalism and for-profit prisons. Well, there it is.

WASD to move, Arrow keys to shoot in 8 directions.
